about_the_game:
The EX Graphic Baseset Outdoor is a blend of outdoor graphics combinations. This official RPG Maker map chip asset consists of high-quality pixel art!

This base set is crafted to serve as a strong starting point for creating your own RPG.

It includes four distinct regions that can be easily combined.

The character chips feature various objects such as doors, water, and flames.

By placing these animated objects as events, you can bring dynamic elements to your game scenes!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

【tilesets (9 sheets)】

− A1-A5 tiles：5 sheets

− B-E tiles：4 sheets

【character (6 sheets)】

− Door

− Flame

− Cloads

− Schadow´s

− Water

− Chess

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Patch Notes: 15.11.24

〇New Content

2 New Tile Sheets:

EX_Outside_A1_Beach

EX_Outside_Update_2

〇Recolored Content

10 Recolored Tile Sheets:

EX_Outside_A1_Alternate

EX_Outside_A1_Alternate_2

EX_Outside_A2_Alternate

EX_Outside_A2_Alternate_2

EX_Outside_A3_Alternate

EX_Outside_A4_Alternate

EX_Outside_A5_Alternate

EX_Outside_B_Alternate

EX_Outside_C_Alternate

EX_Outside_Update_Alternate

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・Rights must be indicated when using assets.

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
